page.title: 18EASTNOR VILLAGE
page.content: As Eastnor is only a small village, and not many vehicles come though the actual village, the pollution level is very low.In a traffic survey, on the road that goes past the famous post office we saw 1 push bike,52 cars, 12 vans and 3 landrovers. There is a military air base nearby, so we very often get Hercules carrier planes and Tornado fighters passing overhead and flying very low at about 30 metres. The weather in Eastnor isn't very good most of the time because we get clouds up from the Bristol channel, which arrive on the Malvern hills! There are many well kept footpaths around the Deer park and Obelisk, used by the many tourists.
